prompts: Create a colorful bird-like Pokemon that combines fighting and flying attributes.
I want a dynamic Pokemon that showcases agility and strength in its design.
Generate a Pokemon with a vibrant green and red color palette, perfect for battle.
Make a humanoid Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a luchador wrestler.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels in aerial combat with a unique blend of colors.
Design a fierce yet friendly Pokemon that is known for its acrobatic moves.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a distinct personality.

distinctive_features: Feathered crest on top of the head
